name: Breast density
description: Breast density refers to the proportion of fatty tissue to fibroglandular tissue in the breast as seen on a mammogram.

attributes.name: density score
attributes.description: Numeric score representing the breast density on a scale from 1.0 to 4.99.

attributes.name: density category
attributes.description: Categorical classification of breast density based on mammographic appearance.

values.name: a: The breasts are almost entirely fatty.
b: There are scattered areas of fibroglandular density.
c: The breasts are heterogeneously dense, which may obscure small masses.
d: The breasts are extremely dense, which lowers the sensitivity of mammography.
